user.about: ugh i deleted my google account because i never use gmail or anything for it but i forgot i used that to sign into my account on here. and google's dumb and makes you pay to restore an account so i just made a new one :( all of my old styles are on my old account!!!!! you can still message me if you have any questions or problems with them but i can't get on that account anymore so i'll be posting my new styles here. please check out my old styles because those are some of my favorites i've made!! -old themes are here -questions, concerns, requests, etc go here
